body:
This is blasphemy. Utter blasphemy that Rance will destroy and kill in an instant.

And for the comment below, the reason why she's 1 year old is because in the Rance universe, Kalars/the species that she is apparently grows really fast. For some reason, in the span of maybe a month? She was born, grew to the size of a human toddler and could speak proper language. It's not cos she's special, it's a race/species thing. Kalars grow up really fast when they're young then they age really slow.
i looked at this character, how is she 1 year old, what do they mean by this
♡♡♡♡♡ This is so cute, i really love it ¡please give us more! ♡♡♡♡♡
